meanings.definition: An element of a culture or system of behavior that may be considered to be passed from one individual to another by nongenetic means, especially imitation.
meanings.sent1: The funny meme made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent2: She shared a meme about cats on social media.
meanings.sent3: The meme about dancing penguins was so silly.
meanings.sent4: His contagious laughter became a meme among his friends.
meanings.sent5: The meme of the dancing baby became famous quickly.

meanings.definition: An image, video, piece of text, etc., typically humorous in nature, that is copied and spread rapidly by internet users.
meanings.sent1: I saw a meme with a grumpy cat online.
meanings.sent2: The meme of the dog wearing sunglasses was hilarious.
meanings.sent3: My favorite meme is the one with the confused math lady.
meanings.sent4: The meme of the sneezing panda went viral.
meanings.sent5: She couldn't stop laughing at the meme of the clumsy baby.
